data.title: Erin Hershey and Brian Presley
data.text:
Brian has a surprise planned for his lady love. Erin thought she was doing an interview

for "Entertainment Tonight" about Super Soap Weekend, but it was all a set up!!

Here, Erin gets a carriage ride to the Magic Castle, where a surprise is waiting for her...

Erin realizes this is no promo, because here comes Brian!

With champagne, roses, a glass slipper, and a diamond ring...

"You are my soulmate, and I want to grow old with you," Brian says,

and then gets down on one knee. "Will you marry me?"

Erin says YES!

Erin and Brian celebrate...

The happy (and newly engaged) couple dances...

And Erin gives Brian a kiss...

Brian tells "ET" that he proposed at the Magic Castle because Erin is his princess.

Erin said she had always wondered how he would propose to her but had never

expected something like this! "Am I not the luckiest woman in the world?"

(You ARE the luckiest woman, Erin!!)
